评论详情: Gorgeous dress with vibrant colors. It fits on top and through the waist but falls below my knees. For reference, I'm 5', 114 lbs, 34a, curvy figure. I'm returning it. I gave 3 stars because it's beautiful like the picture and good quality.
This dress is pretty but it runs very small. I returned it and they refunded my money.
This dress is very comfy and cute on, I get so many compliments at work when I wear it.

The shipping was set out by two weeks and I saw this when I ordered so this was expected. Once I received it and pulled the clear pack out I could see a very large hole right in front of the garment before removing it from that pack. The cotton/rayon was super thin and probably would not wear very well. Very disappointed! Sent back. Thankfully there is free return if you go to Staples.

Amazon recommended a size Large, But Nina Renee wore it in a size small n I weigh less ,so size small was perfect. For reference I'm 5'2 125# 36 C Why does Amazon say I'm a size large? Wore to church N a party Nice compliments

Ordered this to wear to work during the hot summer months and it is perfect! I got so many complements.  I ordered a medium. I’m 5’4 158lbs and it fit great!  Would be cute in the fall with boots too!
Beautiful color lightweight and soft but unfortunately it ran too big so I had to return it

This dress is so adorable. Comfy, cute, stylish, and not sheer at all. Please, please, please make this in more colors. Even solids would be nice! Highly recommended. I usually wear size small or 4-6 but based on reviews I went with the XS - so glad I did. It’s perfect.

I recently wore this to a professional conference, and when I personally approached one of the presenters, she actually began to speak to me first by saying, "Your dress is stunning!" Never have I received a compliment as that!

The material is beautiful and bright.  The style is VERY flattering, and the quality of the material is seems decent. I normally wear a medium, and based on the size chart that is what I ordered.  This dress has to be put on over your head and there is no give or stretch to the circumference stitching where the top part of the dress is sewn to the bottom half of the dress.  It was a little bit of a struggle to get it on and it felt like it could rip.  I sent it back and ordered a large.  I'm 5'3 and weight 142lbs.  Fingers crossed the large works out because I LOVED the dress.
Good quality

This dress fits great and is really beautiful. I'm 5'7", and it is a good length, not too short. It isn't sheer either. I dress it up for networking or dress it down to run errands. Perfect for any occasion!
Got this in a Large size 10-12

I loved the fabric, I loved the color, I loved the style.  Unfortunately, I didn't immediately try it on because we have had weeks of unusually cold weather.  When I did try to wear it to a wedding reception, I couldn't get it on.  The seam between the bodice and the skirt was so small that it barely fit over my head.  It was not loose.  I had notnoticed the warning....Frequently returned item  Check the product details and customer reviews  to learn more about this item.My fault.  I contacted the seller to see if I could exchange it for something else but the return window had closed three days before my request.
Very soft comfortable fabric and love the sleeves!

评论概述: Pretty dress but not the best design
评论详情: I love this dress but unfortunately the design isn’t the best. The waistline needs some give. It isn’t that it was even tight. It just was structured very ackwardly.  My friend, who weighs about ten pounds less, tried it on and stated the same. Unfortunately, I had to return it. Please keep the pattern and overall design, but update the structure of the waistline for a better flow!.
Every time I wear this I get compliments. I can't wait to get the blue/green version!
The sleeve was already torn off when I got it. It’s huge and boxy. Not in the good way either. I returned this item. Color was pretty though
Beautiful colors, nicely made, flattering fit! Love it 🥰
I wore this as a dress and beach coverup- it’s beautiful!
Soft fabric, good quality, may run a bit large. Color is intense.

评论概述: Wicked cute dress gorgeous blue color but tight below bust
评论详情: I ordered this and could probably wear it but it is tight below the bust and tends to make you look pregnant because of that. I reordered in XL which was supposed to show up in a day but is now several weeks out...bummed! So I am hanging on to the L in case the XL is just too huge...It is very cute but disappointed it is so hard to get this sorted out. Hoping the XL shows up before this return window closes or I will have to return it maybe reorder the L again...oh no!  Update the XL arrived and just too big in chest and shoulders just looks sloppy. So returning XL and keeping the L which is a bit tight under the bust...maybe Ill lose a few pounds.
I'm a solid 16 to 18, and every piece this co makes is a little too small in the bust under the boobs. The garments are beautiful, but they need a 2x.
fabric is not sheer and is soft. Looking forward to wearing this during the hot summer. Could be great for going out with a nice pair of sandals or as a bathing suit cover up!

I wish I had taken a picture before sending it back. The dress was the length of a shirt, didn’t fit over my chest, and the fabric and pattern are not even in the same ballpark as the listing images. I was really hoping this would look great.
I bought this dress knowing it was a loose boho style dress, what I didn’t know was how shapeless and unflattering it would be. Pattern was cute. Returned it.

This top has a pretty print, but it runs very small in the waist area. The fabric is very nice, but it wrinkles at the drop of a hat. Very fast delivery on this blouse but I would not purchase it again.
Over all is comfy and colors are beautiful. I wish it was all cotton but… I’ll keep it. It’ll save my lazy summer days even around the house.
Color is spot on but dress runs a little big and the fabric is thin. Wrinkles easily.

There is no stretch, so order your size. I usually wear a large and the XL fits perfectly. This is a great dress for the summer. The fabric breathes without being sheer, and the cut doesn't make you look pregnant.
Really pretty but a little tight around waist.  Soft

I had ordered the wrong size apparently and was heartbroken when I received it and had to send it back. It took awhile to get another but it has been SOOOO worth the wait. Absolute quality craftsmanship. Beautiful blouse. Boho Chic
Flattering
The fabric is not see-through and does not wrinkle easily, it hangs nicely and has a flattering cut. The color is gorgeous and has not bled or faded.
I’m 5’8 and it was too short-waisted for me.

评论概述: Tunic that feels good on the body!
评论详情: It just so happens I am wearing this tunic, with leggings, as I type this review. It is so comfortable, but pretty enough to wear just about anywhere you'd like to go. I love it!
I love it. I can dress up or down with this one. I'm 5'0" and 132lbs. It's very flowy. You can wear this on summer, spring and autumn!

This is a lovely blouse - does not cling anywhere, yet top part (bodice) is slightly fitted, flowing into a flowing, flattering top.  Colors are vibrant (blue/greens) and the fabric appears to be of very good quality.  Not thin at all.  It is a gift- and the recipient really, really liked the top.  Bought some legging in cobalt blue to compliment the top.

评论概述: Love but there’s a hole in it
评论详情: Love this dress but I tried it on when I first got it - fit well, put it back in the bag. I just took it out to iron and there’s a hole along the seam I didn’t notice and I missed the return window. Very upset - it’s in a spot that will be obvious even if sewn because they didn’t use long enough material in that spot
Loved this dress. I dried it once and it fit me perfectly.
Loved the color and print but it made me look too dumpy.
Too small at the chest. I'm not big chested.
Came apart at the seam after one wash.
Love this dress. Perfect fall transition piece. Runs long. I ended up cutting the bottom of mine off. But other than that, true to size- I ordered a small!
Great comfy wear
I thought this looked cute but I couldn’t wear it because there is no give in the fabric and it made my boobs look smashed.
Nicely made in flowy rayon . Light weight but not sheer. Vibrant Fits true to size.5'7" 155 XL.

This shirt is very nice, colors are beautiful, material is nice. It was just too big, and for me, very unflattering. The way it is cut I can't belt it either. Might be great for someone else.  I returned.

This top is absolutely adorable. However, even after sizing up two sizes, I could not pull it over my shoulderd because it was so tight at the seam underneath the bust. The color and pattern were beautiful and it looked to be well made. A slim person could likely wear their normal size. Those of us who have thickened in the shoulder and back areas should beware of fit issues like I had.
Weird fit, heavy material, tight in bodice. Returned.
I am never sure if the picture of the item will live up to my expectations. This top did. The fabric is soft. The colors are vibrant. And the top fits beautifully.
The fabric and fit are perfect. Cool, comfortable weight. Great for a mini dress or long tunic with leggings. Nicely made. Altogether a classy boho tunic that has a variety of beautiful colors.

Just okay. Type of material that you would find at Ross, so a little overpriced in my opinion. Colors were a little brighter than in photos shown on site. Ordered a XL 16/18 based on reviews for a looser fit. Unfortunately I think that is is just not as flattering on a busty woman. Maybe a smaller size would have been more flattering but I wanted something loose and flowy. I am 5' 8.5" and 179lbs with a 40" bust. Length was right above the knee.
A bit too short for me to wear out even though I’m only 5 ft tall but it’s comfortable and wear it as a pajama

If you want this to fit loose like the pictures size up! I am normally a M/L and ordered an XL to fit as pictured and im glad I did! Its thin material and easily wrinkled but the wrinkles easily came out when hung I in the bathroom as I showered! Very happy with this dress and its perfect for hot days since its a thinner material and flowy!

My dress came with a hole/tear in the fabric which is disappointing.  If it wasn’t a hassle for me to return I may have given it another shot.  The nearest drop off for returns is 25 minutes one way. Colors are beautiful.  I may have been able to go with an XS, but I suspect it would shrink after washing.  My measurements are 5’4”, 34DD and 120 lbs.  The dress was longer than expected so I think the dress would fall below the knees for anyone shorter than me.  The fabric is heavier than anticipated and will probably need to be ironed.
A dress the fabric was nice

I hate that I have to write this review because the dress is adorable and sets on me the way that the dress style should. Unfortunately, I am also very disappointed and disgusted.  1. It came in stuffed in a bag and wrinkled 2. The seem that sits just below the breast area has no give. There is a zigzag stitch holding it together and a straight stitch along the pattern line which prohibits any give the zigzag would have had. 3. It REEKS of HEAVY CIGARETTE SMOKE.  I gave it two stars because: 1) colors are beautiful 2) shape of the dress is great
I wasn't noticing that it was from China!  It runs VERY SMALL!  THE 3X was fine!

This is a very pretty dress. I think it would flatter you if you are tall and lean. I am 5 foot three with a larger chest and so it did not flatter me very much. But the dress is Madewell it’s a pretty color and his nice and light weight for summer!

I hung this top up on arrival, about 2 weeks ago and forgot about it. It was so wrinkled I just decided to iron it. When ironing the bottom 6-8 inches I noticed a horizontal rip in the fabric, not on a seam. I am disabled and getting the item returned is difficult. This may be an isolated incident, just a heads up. Very disappointed because the colors and print are very nice.

评论概述: Wish it fit.  May return for exchange.

This dress is so cute on!  True to size and so flattering.  Not tight in the waste but a little fitted. Totally recommend. I got blue and red. I got blue in medium and the red in small (just because they didn’t have medium). There is no difference between them.
The fit was not at all flattering. It was very large in the legs giving it a clown like appearance.
Beautiful fabric but fit way too big.  It’s very hard to order correct size.
The only ding is that it is rather tight under the bust.
Nice but way off on sizing.

I absolutely love this dress. The cut is perfect, it's comfy & loose, but also flattering. I really wish they made more with this cut; I have ordered the dress in both colors. This is actually the second time buying the green. The 1st time I bought it was several summers ago, and I wore it so often, and lent it out to friends, etc. It's still wearable after being worn hundreds of times, but it is starting to look a little thin, so I wanted a back up.

Ordered a size large because it’s intended to fit sizes 12-14 and I normally wear a 10-12. This dress was skin tight with absolutely no stretch. Wanted to return but it ripped while I was taking it off.
It’s really lovely and made very well but I looked like a cow in it! I hated to send it back because the color and fabric are gorgeous. I think it would only look truly great on a skinny person.

Eh just not cute! I am 5'9, 143lbs, A/B bra (usually a medium). I ordered the small and it's still so big and boxy. Too short to wear as a dress for me, the bust area could fit 2-3 of me in it. Looks so cute on many other reviewers though! Maybe if you're short and size down 1-2 times it will look great?
Fits perfect and very flattering.

I'm 5.1 and around 115 lbs and the extra small still give me a lot of wiggle room, but I don't really mind that. It still looks very nice. The hem hits my leg right above the knee.

Beautiful color! Cute dress! However NOT for busty girls..(38C). Runs small.So tight in chest I could not get it on. Length good for shorter ladies; hits 2-3 inches above knee. Very comfortable, pretty fabric you can get it on.

Really love it and feel pretty in it

评论概述: Love it... The colors are great.
评论详情: The colors are vibrant, the fabric is nice, and the print is great.  I'm 38-C, and the bust is a tad tight. Solved that by wearing a sports bra, instead of an underwire.  Also, had to snip off quite a few threads dangling from the hem. Your quality control needs a bit more checking.
Colors are as pictured! Very modest and gorgeous. It is a very loose dress so I would stay true to your normal size or even size down.

评论概述: Not for large busted women at all!
评论详情: I should have paid attention to the reviews that said this was not for larger busted women.  I thought it was a matter of personal taste, but it's not about taste, at all.  The dress has a seam all the way around, that is meant to fall just under the breast.  If you're larger than, say, a C-cup, that is not going to happen fit-wise, unless you order the dress 1-2 sizes bigger, which would make it very unflattering overall.  This will be a return for me.

评论概述: Item delivered was made from a different print than photos.
评论详情: I was so excited about this top, but it was nothing like the product pictured when it arrived. The print was different, it's not as long as pictured, and sizing ran very small, even on the XL.

I’ve worn this dress twice to sit in class (I’m a college student), and hand washed it once. It already has two holes in it - one right below the neckline and a second in the seam under the sleeve. While the dress is pretty, it is way too cheap and fragile. I wouldn’t recommend it to anyone or purchase it again.

I love the print and overall style of this, but it runs small (not hopelessly) and the empire waist is not elastic (as I expected given the styling). The fabric itself has no stretch, either, so this is not a forgiving, easy garment.  The fabric itself is nice - a good weight, and not sheer, which is good if you wear this as a dress.  Sizing up is necessary if you want any ease in the bust, empire waist, shoulders/back -- there's plenty of room in the body and hips, as there's a gather at the waistline. The (unfortunate) effect with the top of this garment being a bit snug is that I end up looking pregnant in it. It's not a good look for me at my post-menopausal, salt-and-pepper hair stage of life! ;)  So here's my take on this: IF it's large enough to fit well, it's awesome - a "5 star" for sure. Because the sizes run small, I gave it three stars as just average. Now I need to decide whether to return it or not! If I drop my "covid 20" from Covid-19 inactivity, it would fit much better.
Not roomy at all.

评论概述: Beautiful dress.  Bottom was flowy, but bodice was too tight
评论详情: Beautiful dress.  Bottom was flowy, but bodice was too tight.

I'm 5'4" and weigh about 130 lbs.  I believe I got the medium.  This dress fits loosely and comfortably, which was what I wanted for the summer.  It's not sheer at all.  There's no stretch to the fabric, but the way it's cut... it really doesn't need much stretch.  I wouldn't say it was flattering, but it's very pretty and I love it for a relaxed, summer dress.  I didn't notice any shrinkage, but I wash in cold water and I hung it to dry.
